about_the_game:
Set in a fantastical world where the oceans have been turned into vast living forests, Shuvani must traverse one of them to protect his family, taking on all manner of amalgamated creatures along the way.

If you manage to defeat the waves of enemies, you can unlock powerful new abilities to use in the next fight before moving on to the next room.

SHUVANI’S PATH

Utilize your abilities to the fullest and defeat all enemies standing in your way, for you will get only one chance to reach the heart of the forest and fulfill Shuvani's duty. As you overcome the ever-changing challenges this hostile environment presents, you will have the opportunity to add new skills to your toolkit, enabling you to surpass the enemies overwhelming power with your very own.

PERSONALIZE YOUR PLAYSTYLE

  • 3 different types of magics: arcane, astral and totemic

  • 28 unique abilities

  • Soon equippable artifacts with permanent upgrades, and permanent upgrades.

  • Be creative! Combine different magics and abilities to create powerful combos.

  • Explore different approaches and develop effective strategies

  • Scalable difficulty and a thrilling final battle

SEEK THE RELIC AND BREAK THE CYCLE

Find and confront the creature that has stolen your only way out of the forest. Discover why it attacked you and unveil a fearsome final plan.

name: Shuvani

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Shuvani is an isometric roguelike where the protagonist faces creatures in a living forest to protect her family. Unlock skills, combine magics and face challenges to retrieve a relic that will allow them to return home.
